# Aelion Calc

> **The All-in-One Python Toolkit for Students & Developers.**
>
> From training **Neural Networks** from scratch to **Ethical Hacking**, Data Science, and building beautiful **CLI Apps**â€”all in a single, zero-dependency library.

![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-1.3.0-blue) ![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-green) ![Build](https://img.shields.io/badge/build-passing-brightgreen)

**Aelion Calc** replaces heavy libraries like Pandas, PyTorch, and Scikit-Learn with lightweight, educational implementations. It allows students to see *how* technology works under the hood.

**Author* Rana Ahmad



---

## Installation

```bash
pip install aelion_calc
